scripts.build: npm run fix-zondax && webpack && cp -f ../../wasm/bundlemain/main.wasm dist/
scripts.fix-zondax: cat node_modules/@zondax/filecoin-signing-tools/package.json > node_modules/@zondax/filecoin-signing-tools/package.json.old ; cat node_modules/@zondax/filecoin-signing-tools/package.json.old | jq '. | .exports."." = { browser: "./browser/filecoin_signer_wasm.js", node: "./nodejs/filecoin_signer_wasm.js", require: "./nodejs/filecoin_signer_wasm.js", import: "./nodejs/filecoin_signer_wasm.js" }' > node_modules/@zondax/filecoin-signing-tools/package.json
